name: Time-Core
description:
Created for Kingston University's GameJam
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Become a new valued member of the Time-Core!

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Additional Information:
Movement: WASD 
Shoot: Left Mouse Button
Reload: R
Dash: Space
Shop: B (If not in the battle)
Switch weapon: 1-3 / Mouse Wheel
